text:
Hello everyone, I'm sure others have come across this so sorry for asking the question again. I'm not able to download the HubSpot boilerplate theme via cli - does anyone know a work around? Here's what is being returned:

jdub@MacBook-Pro HS Local Dev % npx @HubSpot/create-cms-project john-test-theme
/bin/sh: yarn: command not found
Cloning repo with HTTPS...
Clone failed
Error: Command failed: git clone <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate.git> /Users/jdub/Desktop/HS Local Dev/john-test-theme --single-branch
xcrun: error: unable to load libxcrun (dlopen(/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib, 0x0005): tried: '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib' (mach-o file, but is an incompatible architecture (have 'x86_64', need '')), '/System/Volumes/Preboot/Cryptexes/OS/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib' (no such file), '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib' (mach-o file, but is an incompatible architecture (have 'x86_64', need ''))).

    at makeError (/Users/jdub/.npm/_npx/e7a28e0c91e40dfc/node_modules/execa/index.js:174:9)
    at /Users/jdub/.npm/_npx/e7a28e0c91e40dfc/node_modules/execa/index.js:278:16
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
    at async createProject (/Users/jdub/.npm/_npx/e7a28e0c91e40dfc/node_modules/@HubSpot/create-cms-project/lib/createProject.js:73:3) {
  code: 1,
  stdout: '',
  stderr: "xcrun: error: unable to load libxcrun (dlopen(/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib, 0x0005): tried: '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib' (mach-o file, but is an incompatible architecture (have 'x86_64', need '')), '/System/Volumes/Preboot/Cryptexes/OS/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib' (no such file), '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/libxcrun.dylib' (mach-o file, but is an incompatible architecture (have 'x86_64', need ''))).\n",
  failed: true,
  signal: null,
  cmd: 'git clone <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate.git> /Users/jdub/Desktop/HS Local Dev/john-test-theme --single-branch',
  timedOut: false,
  killed: false
}
